resource.name: NCDHC FHIR Document Base
resource.description: NCDHC FHIR document profile using Bundle resource

resource.name: NCDHC FHIR Newborn Discharge Document
resource.description: NCDHC FHIR Newborn Discharge document profile using Bundle resource

resource.name: NCDHC Composition Clinical Document Base
resource.description: This profile is used to represent the Compsition associated with a FHIR Clinical Document

resource.name: NCDHC Composition Newborn Discharge
resource.description: Composition based profile to define the structure and narrative content of FHIR document pertaining to a newborn's discharge from a health facility including measurements, date of discharge and other identifying information

resource.name: NCDHC Encounter CDHR
resource.description: This is the base NCDHC Encounter profile for CDHR Health Interactions.

resource.name: NCDHC Encounter DPHR
resource.description: This is the base NCDHC Encounter profile for DPHR Health Interactions.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Base
resource.description: This is the base profile for NCDHC Obsrevation. All NCDHC Observation profiles SHALL extend this profile (vital-sgins profiles are excluded)

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Feeding Method
resource.description: Observation profile to record Feeding Method for the newborn in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Newborn Feeding Status
resource.description: Observation profile to record Feeding Status of the newborn in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Milk Feeding Status
resource.description: Observation profile to record Milk Feeding Status of the newborn in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Sex Detected At Birth
resource.description: Observation profile to record sex of the baby identified at birth

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Vital Sign Body Height Profile
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Observation Vital Sign resource to record, search and fetch Body Height or Birth Length of the patient in context.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Vital Sign Body Weight Profile
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Observation Vital Sign resource to record, search and fetch Body Weight of the patient in context.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Vital Sign Head Circumference Profile
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Observation Vital Sign resource to record, search and fetch Head Circumference of the patient in context.

resource.name: NCDHC Organisation
resource.description: Profile to represent a Organisation in NCDHC Context

resource.name: NCDHC Child Patient
resource.description: Profile to represent a Child Patient in NCDHC Context

resource.name: NCDHC Expectant Mother Patient
resource.description: Profile to represent a Expectant Mother Patient in NCDHC Context

resource.name: NCDHC Practitioner
resource.description: Profile to represent a Practitioner in NCDHC Context

resource.name: NCDHC PractitionerRole
resource.description: Profile to represent a PractitionerRole in NCDHC Context

resource.name: NCDHC Detected Sex ValueSet
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Values to represent what type of NCDHC ValueSet Detected Sex.

resource.name: NCDHC Feeding Method ValueSet
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Values to represent what type of NCDHC ValueSet Feeding Method.

resource.name: NCDHC Milk Feeding Status ValueSet
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Values to represent what type of NCDHC ValueSet Milk Feeding Status.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Completion Status
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Values to represent what type of Observation Completion Status are applicable to each completed check/observation.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation DataAbsentReason ValueSet
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Values to represent what type of Observation Data Absent Reasons are applicable when the Observation instance doesn't contain any value

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Interpretation
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Codes to determine what type of Observation Interpretation are applicable to each completed check/observation.
